column3: 1 melt-In a large mug, melt 1 tablespoon of softened butter in the microwave for about 30 seconds
7 Cut or tear-Cut or tear 1 slices of bread into bite-size pieces
2 Roll-Roll the butter around in the cup to coat it
3 whisk-In the mug, whisk one egg with a fork until well blended
4 Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon over the egg
5 Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract to the mug
8 add-add bread pieces to the egg mixture in the mug, pressing the bread down into the egg
9 Microwave-Microwave on high for 90 seconds until the egg is cooked through
10 Put-Put the cup's contents on a plate
11 cut-cut the contents on plate, and serve
